item.description:
The Sierra Club urgently needs your help in the upcoming election!

You can make a difference in this election by being part of the grassroots movement that's sweeping this nation. By volunteering in these last crucial days, we can all wake up November 5th happy that we have done our part.

Phone Bank in Boston
Sunday, November 2, from 5:00pm to 8:30pm
Sierra Club Offices
10 Milk St, Suite 632 (enter at 294 Washington St., near State Street and Downtown Crossing T), Boston

Join us this Sunday at Sierra Club headquarters as we call Sierra members in NH as part of our national get-out-the-vote-drive. With just a few more days to go, we need to be sure that all NH Sierra members vote! Just come to the Sierra Offices with your cellphone and we'll supply dinner, scripts, and call lists. Please let us know if you can come: Contact phil@sierraclubmass.org or call 617-610-3054.

Together we can make sure the environment is the big winner in 2008.

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Election Phone Banking in Boston
